evidence.claim: Avida Home Health employs FHIR standards for secure data exchange.
The company is compliant with HIPAA regulations for patient data handling.
Avida uses HL7 protocols to ensure interoperability with various health information systems.
Integration with X12 EDI formats for billing processes is mentioned in their EHR interfacing documentation.

icp.icp_reason: No evidence of X12 transaction use or API integration.
